alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Logan and western Gove Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Scott State Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Logan and western Gove Counties, including the following locations... The Monument Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
